# Welcome to Customer Analytics Dashboard

This dashboard provides comprehensive analytics for customer segments and cohort analysis.

## Available Analysis

- [Customer Segment Heatmap](heatmap.html) - Interactive cohort analysis with segment filtering

## Authentication

This application requires Microsoft authentication to access. Please log in with your organizational account.

## Features

- **Interactive Visualizations**: Dynamic charts and heatmaps powered by Observable Plot
- **Segment Analysis**: Filter and analyze different customer segments
- **Cohort Tracking**: Track customer behavior over time
- **Secure Access**: Protected by Azure AD authentication
